response.overview: Distracted, a driver hits a half-deer half-human cyclist with her car. Rather than take her to the hospital and risk getting arrested, she brings the cyclist home to try to fix them up herself. But when the cyclist wakes up, things take a turn for the worse.
response.tagline: When a human in a bear mascot outfit runs down a half-deer half-human cyclist, her carefully controlled world is threatened by real world consequences.
response.title: HIT
